summary: Two Australian sprinters face the brutal realities of war when they are sent to fight in the Gallipoli campaign in Turkey during World War I.
cast: Mark Lee|Bill Kerr|Harold Hopkins|Charles Lathalu Yunipingu|Heath Harris|Ron Graham|Gerda Nicolson|Mel Gibson|Robert Grubb|Tim McKenzie|David Argue|Brian Anderson|Reg Evans|Jack Giddy|Dane Peterson|Paul Linkson|Jenny Lovell|Steve Dodd|Harold Baigent|Robyn Galwey|Don Quin|Phyllis Burford|Marjorie Irving|John Murphy|Bill Hunter|Diane Chamberlain|Peter Ford|Ian Govett|Geoff Parry|Clive Bennington|Giles Holland-Martin|Moshe Kedem|John Morris|Don Barker|Kiwi White|Paul Sonkkila|Peter Lawless|Saltbush Baldock|Les Dayman|Stan Green|Max Wearing|Graham Dow|Peter R. House
title: Gallipoli
